Description:
At Commonwealth Pain & Spine, run-of-the-mill care simply doesn't cut it for the practice's team of experienced, highly skilled pain management physicians. We have 20 offices conveniently located throughout Kentucky, southern Indiana, and Illinois. Check out our locations here.
Commonwealth Pain & Spine is different from comparable pain management clinics in treating patients. The team avoids the standard surgery-first delivery model in favor of a less invasive, more cost-efficient model. Because each physician recognizes how exhausting chronic pain feels, they make it a point to empathize with the needs of their patients.
The physicians at Commonwealth Pain & Spine are some of the finest experts in the country.

My massage therapist always wondered how I could get my back knotted up so quickly!
My right arm had been numb and tingling. Last few days I couldn't even use a spray bottle.

Got an appointment with Dr. Amol Soin at the Ohio Plain Clinic in Centerville.
He found 2 pinched nerves on my back and treated my stiff wrist this afternoon as well. I know the treatment is not going to take full affect for a day or two but I can already feel a huge relief. I've got mobility back in my fingers. I can finally flex my fingers and move my neck without pain and without medication. My shoulders are defying my back from the hunching posture I've adopted 
He treated it with great precision, within minutes, with X-ray targeting the exact points I could feel were causing it.

One thing I observed during my experience at his practice (I realized it driving back to work) was how friendly and cool his staff was, right after I observed light hearted humor between the patients in the waiting room about their chronic aches and pains.
I felt so comfortable and confident about my procedure, attributing it mostly to Dr. Soin's expertise, and acknowledging how comfortable I felt talking to the staff and how they made me feel.

Thank you Dr. Soin and your entire team! Description: At Midwest Pain Clinics, our mission is to provide the most advanced and compassionate care to patients in pain. Our world-class physicians are dedicated to precisely diagnosing and treating the source of your chronic pain, not masking it. We specialize in minimally invasive, non-surgical procedures to get you back to work, back to family, and back to living as soon as possible. Call today to schedule an appointment!

Description:
Whether you've had a recent sports injury or you've been suffering with chronic pain due to back, neck, knee pain or any other pain, DOC Pain Management is committed to giving patients their quality of life back.

At DOC Pain Management we do things differently - our approach to pain management ensures that you get the right care from the right doctors and that your treatment starts as soon as possible. Our multi-disciplinary approach to pain management allows us to use a wide range of treatment options and the most up to date pain management procedures to decrease our patient's pain while increasing their activity.

DOC Pain Management is located within Dayton Outpatient Center and provides a one-stop facility for patients needs.

Description: Envision Pain Management employs only Board-Certified/Eligible Fellowship Trained physicians to provide you with comprehensive, trusted and cutting-edge care. We're a specialty practice, focused only on pain management. Whatever your pain, we have something to offer. By utilizing interventional, operative and medical therapies, we can help you: work better, play better and live better. At Envision Pain Management our mission is to provide the highest quality, comprehensive pain care to patients throughout the community, the region and the state. We are a leader in advancing quality joint, muscle, nerve, and spine pain care and technology while providing superior access, service and care to our patients and their families.

Categories: ["Chiropractor","Pain management physician","Sports massage therapist","Sports medicine clinic"]
Description: The Chiropractic Doctor, established since 1984, prides itself as the pain relief specialist of Wyoming, Michigan. With over 47 years of combined experience, Dr. Michael Halliday and Dr. Parker Bowen lead their team in providing exceptional care to patients of all ages, offering chiropractic services, massage therapy, and sports medicine solutions. Their expertise extends to treating migraines and headaches, ensuring a comprehensive approach for pain management. The welcoming team at The Chiropractic Doctor prioritizes creating a safe, valued, and positive experience, leaving patients feeling reassured and pain-free.

The back injection for the L4-L5 I read previously was a dreaded experience for some, but mine was better than the best. I LITERALLY felt a teeny pinch and a couple nerve "zaps" (Dr let me know he's in the right spot, we both laughed during the procedure) I DID NOT FEEL the needle travel to the nerve site AT ALL. I think many people hype this injection up because it's performed under Xray and they have to ensure they place the medication in EXACTLY the correct position. While many others believe this procedure was the " worst experience of my life, I had just the opposite! Keep in mind I came directly to Dr. Ptacek's office from being an inpatient at the hospital still in hospital clothes because my husband had taken my clothes home to wash.
Dr. Ptacek: I cannot express my admiration more for your care, professionalism, compassion, and excellent practice staff more. You've DEFINITELY earned my trust, and future pain management needs by assembling a practice that should serve as a top-tier shining example of excellence!

Categories: ["Pain management physician","Anesthesiologist","Family practice physician","Pain control clinic"]
Description: At the division of Interventional Pain at Rapid City Medical Center, our main goal is to improve function while decreasing pain and reliance on opioid medications. Because pain can affect all aspects of life, we believe that the management of chronic pain requires a collaborative relationship and team approach utilizing and reassessing multifaceted treatment plans. We are dedicated to providing the latest treatments to our patients in a safe, high quality, and cost-effective manner to get you back on your feet and outdoors. Some conditions we treat are cancer-related pain, nerve pain, post-surgical pain, hip pain, knee pain, back pain, pelvic pain, and more. Give your Rapid City pain management clinic a call to request an appointment today!

Description: Timothy Howard, MD is a dedicated pain management physician at 1803 Forest Hills Rd W., Wilson, NC. Specializing in minimally-invasive spine procedures and multifaceted treatment approaches, he's an essential member of the Interventional Pain Management Team for the EmergeOrtho--Triangle Region. With his wealth of experience, Dr. Howard is committed to providing personalized pain treatment through a patient-centered approach. Trust him for expert care and a focus on your well-being. Since 1952, our center stands as a beacon of compassionate care for bone, joint, and muscle injuries. From prevention to diagnosis and treatment, we're committed to helping you maintain the lifestyle you cherish. Schedule an appointment today!

Description:
*CURRENTLY ACCEPTING NEW PATIENTS - NO REFERRAL NEEDED, CALL TODAY * Phone: (402) 614-1999
Fax: 1-844-766-1649
Omaha Pain Physicians is the regions most comprehensive Pain Management center. Our skilled Pain Doctors offer a wide array of treatment options including, but not limited to the following:
-Epidural Steroid Injections
-Minimally Invasive Neck and Back Pain treatments
-Joint Injections
-IT Pump Management
-Infusion Therapies
-Spinal Cord Stimulators
-Migraine Therapy
-Stem Cell & Platelet Rich Plasma Therapy
-Neuromodulation
-Radiofrequency Ablation
-Medial Branch Blocks
-Botox for Migraines

If it Hurts, we can help.

Description: Matthew W. Wilson is a renowned pain management and rehabilitation physician at 1803 Forest Hills Rd W., Wilson, NC. With extensive education, clinical experience, and a strong commitment to his patients, Wilson is a trusted expert who has helped countless individuals regain their quality of life. He is known for his unwavering dedication to improving the lives of patients suffering from chronic pain, musculoskeletal conditions, and various neurological disorders. Since 1952, our center has stood as a beacon of compassionate care for bone, joint, and muscle injuries. From prevention to diagnosis and treatment, we're committed to helping you maintain the lifestyle you cherish. Schedule an appointment today!

Description: Dual board certified in physical medicine and rehabilitation and pain medicine, Dr. Silverman specializes in the application of targeted interventions for optimization of function through the management of pain. He is especially interested in the use of implanted electrical stimulation devices to manage debilitating pain syndromes which develop following technically successful joint or spine surgeries.

Description:
Our growing team of physicians, specialists, and support staff strive to provide the highest caliber of healthcare, wellness, and wraparound services to the residents of the Dayton and Miami Valley area. Dayton Outpatient Center (DOC) offers a comprehensive range of services to fit your family's needs, including:

* Pain Management
* Vein Management
* Imaging Services: MRIs, X-rays, and CT scans
* Urgent Cares
* Surgery Center

From treating sore throats to performing complicated surgeries, the DOC family of companies provides a wide array of professional healthcare services to fit a patient's needs.

Description:
Open every other Thursday - Please call to confirm Thursday/Friday availability and to schedule an appointment

At Southwest Spine & Pain Center, our double-board certified pain management specialists provide comprehensive pain care by using a wide variety of treatment options. This includes injection therapies, minimally invasive surgery, management of appropriate pain medications, and coordinating physical therapy and advanced imaging.

Whether you are suffering from acute or chronic pain, the pain management doctors at Southwest Spine & Pain Center are dedicated to helping you live life to the fullest.

Categories: ["Medical clinic","Medical laboratory","Nurse practitioner","Pain management physician","Pharmacy","Physician assistant","Psychiatrist"]
Description: Physicians at Pain Management Centers of America are specialists in interventional pain management with extensive training and experience. They welcome all patients for evaluation and/or treatment of chronic pain.

Title: MD Pain
Detailed Address: 10700 E Geddes Ave #100, Englewood, CO 80112, United States
Featured Reviews:
[{"review_id":"Ci9DQUlRQUNvZENodHljRjlvT25OYVZVZDROblp4V1V0R2RuVjRWSEJaWVZCMU1GRRAB","review_link":"https://www.google.com/maps/reviews/data=!4m8!14m7!1m6!2m5!1sCi9DQUlRQUNvZENodHljRjlvT25OYVZVZDROblp4V1V0R2RuVjRWSEJaWVZCMU1GRRAB!2m1!1s0x0:0x5bc8bd19b7f8a328!3m1!1s2@1:CAIQACodChtycF9oOnNaVUd4NnZxWUtGdnV4VHBZYVB1MFE%7C0dD9Glkwguk%7C?hl=en-US","name":"tomme elliott","reviewer_id":"104977777664054232109","reviewer_profile":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104977777664054232109?hl=en-US","rating":5,"review_text":"This clinic, and all of their staff from the front line office staff who check you in for your appointment, to the schedulers,  and  the medical techs,  the P.As, and Dr.s , are all very professional, and also seem to actually care about the needs of their patients.
I have been going to the MD pain office in Engelwood for just under a year and after they have opened their Colorado Springs office,  I now am being seen there as I am closer to that clinic, but with regard to both locations I  actually feel like I now have the tools to finally get this pain from degenerative disc disease from gymnastics under control and easier to deal with after over 20 years of pain management at a different clinic.
I felt I had  to add to their multitude of awesome reviews today, especially , because I called to see if there was a possibility of getting scheduled for an injection before the end of the year after meeting my deductable, and even though they are extremely busy this time of year, I received a call back after only have leaving a message an hour prior( most clinics are 48 hrs) to tell me they have received my message and are waiting to hear back from the insurance company and to let me know they recv'd my message.  There have been many times I have felt the need to leave a review but never have the time, but today I made the time.
I would recommend this clinic to anybody out there who wants a possitive outcome and multi level pain management approach, that provides a clean,  stable, knowlegable , safe, and professional pain management.
I have to say not every clinic is perfect but reading the very few the less than perfect reviews here should be taken with a grain of salt because we have to take into consideration that people in pain (personally speaking  here)  are hard to deal with and desperate to keep their pain levels down or at bay,  might be more critical.  But reviews coming  from patients who were late for appointments who had to reschedule or medication problems, or dismissed for whatever reason, in my opinion and experience with MD pain,  it is more to do with the patient, than the staff or this establishment. They run a tight ship.  They are organized. Be ontime for your appts. ( 20 minutes early) Follow your Dr.s advice and procedures, take your prescription as advised. Have good communication  (because they do here) and if all of these boxes check off for you, I promise, you will do fine here and actually get the pain management you deserve, because life is no fun for those of us in pain.  Sometimes a person would do anything to  make it go away for even just a minute, but on those desperate high pain level days try to remember, we are all human here.  A little patients and civility goes a long way, and like I mentioned, I would take poor reviews with a grain of salt on ANY platform, I guess but especially here because speaking from experience, (I can be that wing-nut, unorganized,  running late, problem patient with horrible ADD) I have covered every scenario possible with this clinic in yhe time I have gone here, and the only time I had any issue was the time when **I** was the cause of the issue.
Love both locations, but the Springs location being smaller and more convenient for me is where I will make my appts from here on. ( I hope) Dr Bernardini is brilliant , Charmin, and now I see Meghan but from what I have heard about the others, is that they're all awesome

Good luck to you all on your pain journey and I hope you find some relief out there no matter who you choose to help you.","original_language":"en","review_translated_text":null,"translated_language":null,"published_at":"a week ago","published_at_date":"2025-12-09T22:36:33","response_from_owner_text":null,"response_from_owner_ago":null,"response_from_owner_date":null,"response_from_owner_translated_text":null,"avatar_link":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLxG-T7eRlEjICw5a6ou--F-PwlLT0AYkdckDzkgC3XHZ61yuo=s1920","total_number_of_reviews_by_reviewer":7,"total_number_of_photos_by_reviewer":0,"is_local_guide":false,"experience_details":[],"review_photos":[],"review_origin":"google"},{"review_id":"Ci9DQUlRQUNvZENodHljRjlvT2tjeWJFaHZibE0yU2tkZlVFbFBUSFJaYVdoaE1rRRAB","review_link":"https://www.google.com/maps/reviews/data=!4m8!14m7!1m6!2m5!1sCi9DQUlRQUNvZENodHljRjlvT2tjeWJFaHZibE0yU2tkZlVFbFBUSFJaYVdoaE1rRRAB!2m1!1s0x0:0x5bc8bd19b7f8a328!3m1!1s2@1:CAIQACodChtycF9oOkcybEhvblM2SkdfUElPTHRZaWhhMkE%7C0cxe5YoYM7h%7C?hl=en-US","name":"Noam Paoletti","reviewer_id":"112921643968281873827","reviewer_profile":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112921643968281873827?hl=en-US","rating":2,"review_text":"My experience with the doctor was fine, but the office policy makes it impossible to get adequate care. They agreed but they would only send in a 3 day bridge due to doctor not being in office he was on vacation  but they only sent in 2 days I tried to get it corrected but they refused and they messed up on pick up date and fused to correct that I told them I would go through withdrawl and they said they couldn't do anything about it but would send in nausea medicine for withdrawl which does not help with withdrawl only something like clonidine or Ativan can help.  I told them that with my health it could be dangerous for me to go through withdrawal and I could end up in ER and at worse it could be life threatening.  They still did not care. I have since found out it is unlawful to force a patient into forcing abruptly stopping or forced tapering. Then after this I went to one of my schedule appointments and was told if I wanted to continue as  a patient I would have to take down my negative review since I felt I had no choice I did.  Again they had no right to tell me to do so.  After I had been with them for a few months I had a appointment 7 days before my prescription was due to be filled and they told me to call to get a bridge. I called and due to all the doctors being off or on vacation there was only one doctor working that day.  I was told the doctor was to busy with patients and would not be able to write a bridge for me because they wouldn't have time I said this was wrong and after talking for a while trying to make sure my prescription was filled and still being told they might not fill it I said this was patient harm and prejudice after being told they can at anytime decide not to write prescription it was at their discretion and they had already refused to write one for another patient earlier just because she said who she was a PA that they base there discretion on the patients who are trouble patients. I again said this is patient prejudice and they could open themselves to a malpractice suit,  not saying I would at the time.   But after all this they called me 30 minutes later saying they were dropping me to non compliance and would give me a 30 day prescription. There reason on non compliance was I didn't do my UA which was not true I did it later because when I went in for my appointment I had a blinding migraine and forgot to do it but I came back later and did it they said everything was fine and let me take my UA and not to worry the doctor said it was fine due to the fact it was honest mistake. I'm writing this to let everyone know it is against the law to abruptly force patient off there opiates or to force them to taper when they have valid pain and are not abusing there medication they did this to me by not filling my prescription on day it was due putting my health in danger and they admitted to me that they do this to many of their patients.  You can get a patient advocate to help you if this has happen to you. You can refer your provider to CDC force tapering or forced abrupt discontinued medication. If nessary go to your state medical board or seek legal advocacy support. The other thing they did was release medical information about me to another pain clinic without my permission. Description:
At Commonwealth Pain & Spine, run-of-the-mill care simply doesn't cut it for the practice's team of experienced, highly skilled pain management physicians. We have 20 offices conveniently located throughout Kentucky, southern Indiana, and Illinois. Check out our locations here.
Commonwealth Pain & Spine is different from comparable pain management clinics in treating patients. The team avoids the standard surgery-first delivery model in favor of a less invasive, more cost-efficient model. Because each physician recognizes how exhausting chronic pain feels, they make it a point to empathize with the needs of their patients.
The physicians at Commonwealth Pain & Spine are some of the finest experts in the country.

Description:
At Southwest Spine & Pain Center, our double-board certified pain management specialists provide comprehensive pain care by using a wide variety of treatment options. This includes injection therapies, minimally invasive surgery, management of appropriate pain medications, and coordinating physical therapy and advanced imaging.

Whether you are suffering from acute or chronic pain, the pain management doctors at Southwest Spine & Pain Center are dedicated to helping you live life to the fullest.

Description:
Welcome to Robertson County Physical Medicine where our goal is to help you do the things you love to do in life. Some patients come to us with pain issues while others are looking for overall wellness. In either situation our team is committed to providing you the pain management care that will help you reach those goals.

We are conveniently located in Springfield, TN and it is easy to find us. We offer free parking and we are handicap accessible. Click on the directions button to find an easy route to Robertson County Physical Medicine. We really look forward to meeting you and helping with your health goals.

Title: Mountain View Pain Center
Detailed Address: 3491 E Harmony Rd #230, Fort Collins, CO 80528, United States
Clinic Hours: Monday: 8 a.m.-6 p.m.|Tuesday: 8 a.m.-6 p.m.|Wednesday: Closed|Thursday: Closed|Friday: Closed|Saturday: Closed|Sunday: Closed

Additionally, I would like to express my appreciation to Megan Kane, the physical therapist at Mountain View Pain Center. When she was doing my evaluation of my injuries, my whole expectation was for her to only focus on the areas where I had pain or discomfort. She took the time to help me understand why I have limitations on specific movements and developed a plan for me to work on, so I can expedite the recovery of my physical health.

This place is a joke!  My husband has been coming there every summer since we move to Arizona six years ago.  This year, they decided he was a "new patient" and wouldn't give him his pain meds for 2 weeks as that's how long their lab takes to process pee! (?). We asked his oncologist to supplement his pain meds for the two weeks and he did.  When we went back after the 2 weeks, they said that the lab lost his sample, and he'd have to give another sample and wait another 2 weeks to get his Rx! Description: At Mountain View Pain Center we are dedicated to finding the root cause of your pain. Whether you are dealing with pain from an injury or a condition, we are here to help. While at MVPC, you will receive a custom treatment plan to ensure you get the best care to manage your pain. As an effective alternative to surgery and traditional pain management, we have convenient treatment options available. Start your journey towards a pain-free life by making an appointment with us today!

Description: Dr. Mehta grew up in the suburbs of Boston and attended University of New England College of Osteopathic Medicine, where he was awarded the University of New England Alumni Scholarship and received his Doctorate in Osteopathic Medicine. He then went on to complete his physical medicine and rehabilitation residency at New York-Presbyterian Hospital, the University hospital for Cornell and Columbia University. He completed a sports and interventional pain fellowship at the #1 ranked in orthopedics nationwide, the Hospital For Special Surgery in NYC. Dr. Mehta's approach has always been to emphasize patient education, interventional treatment, pain management, and returning patients to full mobility so that they can get back to enjoying life.

Description:
At Premier Pain Treatment Insitute in Loveland, Ohio, we offer advanced pain management treatments to help you live pain-free. Led by Dr. Michael Danko, we specialize in relief for chronic pain, back pain, joint pain, sciatica, arthritis, and migraines.
Our services include interventional pain procedures, spinal injections, and non-surgical therapies. Conveniently located in Loveland, we proudly serve patients from Cincinnati, Milford, Mason, and surrounding areas. We accept most major insurance plans and provide compassionate, personalized care.
Don't let pain control your life, schedule your appointment today. Call us at 513-454-7246!

Title: Albany And Saratoga Centers For Pain Management
Detailed Address: 3 Care Ln, Saratoga Springs, NY 12866, United States

We had recently moved from Scottsdale, Arizona and were searching for a pain management practice that is reputable and respected in all aspects.
After our first encounter with Dr Martin Ferrillo, and his team, we knew that we had found the right place.
Dr. Ferrillo far exceeded our expectations.  He is personable and thorough in his assessment, and his approach is directed at management and treatment of pain that isn't dependent on medications that create dependency while failing to address the patients issues and needs.
Additionally, he is recognized as a superior practitioner by other physicians and is on the faculty of a major medical center.
My husband, Bill Kurtz, has recently become a patient, too. He shares the same experience.
Based on conversations with others in the waiting room, patients all share the same view.
The team at ASCPM is always accommodating, warm and friendly.  You can rely on everyone being well trained and enjoying their role in whatever capacity they serve.  I feel I can speak from experience as I am a retired nurse and social worker for many, many years, most in an administrative capacity dealing with community issues that engaged government, education, business, and healthcare focused on the whole person.
We highly recommend this practice and Dr Ferrillo.
See for yourself!  Your treatment and plan is directed at treating your condition and will alleviate your current issues at all levels. You can count on it!
Diane Fausel Kurtz

Description:
At ASCPM, our expert team, led by double board-certified Dr. Ferrillo, has provided compassionate, cutting-edge pain relief since 1997. We use state-of-the-art diagnostics and x-ray guided treatments to pinpoint pain sources, allowing us to create personalized treatment plans that minimize discomfort, restore function, and improve well-being.

We also specialize in Regenerative Medicine, including Platelet-Rich Plasma (PRP) and Platelet Lysate (PL) therapy, harnessing the body's natural healing abilities for tissue repair and long-term recovery. Whether managing chronic pain or sports injuries, we are your partners in a pain-free life.

Title: Pain Evaluation & Management Center
Detailed Address: 1550 Yankee Park Pl, Dayton, OH 45458, United States

Please, Please, Please do not go here or let one of your family get so called treatment here.

First off, when we tried to get an appointment we send an message through the website with not answer, called with no answer and left message with no return call. We chose to actually drive to the office and talk to someone about making an appointment. When we got to the office we were told to go to the second office behind the main office to talk with the scheduler. There were 4 employees outside smoking and were very surprised to see us walk into an unattended office. Conveniently the scheduler was not there at the moment so we left paperwork with another employee and left. Astoundingly we received a call the next day to schedule. Not surprised that the person I spoke to was very unprofessional, used street jargon, and was downright rude. Like she was doing us a favor. The appointment was set for a month out.

We get to the appointment and we have to wait an hour and a half past our appointment time to see Dr. Pauley who could not seem to get a string of two words out with out stuttering. She seemed very incompetent. She explained some prescription changes and scribbled instructions on the back of a piece of paper. Professional, I know. Then stated an addiction assessment was needed before any pain medications would be prescribed. She send a referral that was not sent until one and a half weeks later and the progress notes or report of the visit was not on any paperwork aside from the scribbled notes, or forwarded to the facility my mother resides. Of course they did not check to see if the referring doctor took our insurance. I know you are surprised that they did not. We contacted PEMCO to let them know this. Shockingly, it took about two weeks to get some sort of resolution regarding this manner. AGAIN, DO NOT GO HERE FOR YOU OR A FAMILY MEMBER, THEY ARE HORRIBLE FROM START TO FINISH. Description:
Meet Dr. Blick -
After graduating from the University of Kansas residency program, Dr. Blick and his wife, Lauren, moved to Elk City where he began practicing as Chief of Anesthesia at Great Plains Regional Medical Center under the company, Western Oklahoma Anesthesia Consultants. He later started Western Oklahoma Pain Specialists and has offices in Weatherford, Clinton, Woodward and Elk City. Dr. Blick focuses on traveling to his patients to provide the best quality care available.

Title: Center for Pain Management
Detailed Address: 4411 Washington Ave #101, Evansville, IN 47714, United States

Description: At Center for Pain Management, our providers specialize in minimally invasive, interventional pain management. Our network of pain management clinics serves Indiana in eight locations including Evansville & Jasper. Our pain management doctors offer a wide range of treatments with additional services like physical therapy, psychological services, and diagnostic imaging. Our pain management clinics are complemented by ambulatory surgical centers for minimally invasive outpatient procedures. Conditions treated include: post laminectomy syndrome, CRPS, sacroiliitis, sciatica, spondylosis, facet syndrome, and more. Treatments offered include: spinal cord stimulators, steroid injections, intrathecal pain pump implants, and more.

Title: Tyrus Soares, MD
Detailed Address: 7710 Mercy Rd #224, Omaha, NE 68124, United States

I unfortunately, due to lots of surgeries, was left with spinal issues, chronic pain, abdominal pain, etc., that can not be reversed with a quick and easy surgery.

I was pretty young when this happened. Every doctor I went to, took one look at me and judged me from head to toe! Either they pre-labled me or simply refused to even see/help me. Until I  came across Dr. Soares.
I researched him, as Im reading these crazy, nasty comments are popping up about him in the reviews, but something wasnt adding up to me. So I went to go find out for myself.
I am so thankful that I followed my own intuition! (and not other people's negative comments that didnt get their way). I was in desperate search to ease this crippling chronic pain. However, I needed to be able to live my life still, do my jobs daily (physical hard work) not tired or sluggish and above all continue to be a present mother. I needed help that did NOT result in addictions or unable to function daily. After listening to me and finding what works best for my body, Dr. Soares has helped give me my life back and Im forever grateful . He's straight forward, honest, and doesn't leave room for assumptions or guess work. I respect this quality very much.

Description: At Southwest Spine & Pain Center, our double-board certified pain management specialists provide comprehensive pain care by using a wide variety of treatment options. This includes injection therapies, minimally invasive surgery, management of appropriate pain medications, and coordinating physical therapy and advanced imaging. Whether you are suffering from acute or chronic pain, the pain management doctors at Southwest Spine & Pain Center are dedicated to helping you live life to the fullest.

Categories: ["Physiotherapist","Pain control clinic","Pain management physician","Physiotherapy Center","Rehabilitation center"]
Description:
Getting You Back to What Moves You!
Pain & Movement Solutions is redefining pain relief and mobility care, becoming the go-to provider for those looking to avoid surgery, injections, and medications. With five convenient locations in the Black Hills--Belle Fourche, Sturgis, Custer, and both East and West Rapid City--their expert team is ready to help people move better and live fully.
As primary care providers for pain and musculoskeletal issues, their highly skilled Doctors of Physical Therapy and Occupational Therapists offer a direct path to recovery. Patients can skip costly imaging and get straight to the root of their pain with hands-on treatment and personalized care. No referral required. Call to schedule today!

Description:
At ASCPM, our expert team, led by double board-certified Dr. Ferrillo, has provided compassionate, cutting-edge pain relief since 1997. We use state-of-the-art diagnostics and x-ray guided treatments to pinpoint pain sources, allowing us to create personalized treatment plans that minimize discomfort, restore function, and improve well-being.

We also specialize in Regenerative Medicine, including Platelet-Rich Plasma (PRP) and Platelet Lysate (PL) therapy, harnessing the body's natural healing abilities for tissue repair and long-term recovery. Whether managing chronic pain or sports injuries, we are your partners in a pain-free life.

Description:
The physicians, advanced practitioners, and staff at the Pain Management Centers of New England focus on alleviating pain and restoring quality of life for patients throughout New England. In addition to our Newburyport office, our providers staff locations throughout the North Shore of Massachusetts. These locations include the Beth Israel Lahey Health Patient Care Center in Danvers and Addison Gilbert Hospital in Gloucester, MA.
We understand that every person has a different response to acute and chronic pain. Thus, we listen to you and develop an individualized treatment plan based on the cause of your pain and previous treatments that you may have already tried.

Title: Park City Specialty Clinic Pain Management
Detailed Address: 900 Round Valley Dr #200, Park City, UT 84060, United States

I wanted to take a moment to express my profound gratitude for the incredible care you've provided me over these past several years. It's difficult to put into words how much your dedication, compassion, and expertise have meant to me, but I truly believe you are one of the greatest doctors/nurse practitioners a person could ask for. From the very first time I met you, you made me feel heard, understood, and genuinely cared for, transforming what could have been stressful experiences into moments of comfort and trust. Your ability to explain complex things clearly, offer reassurance and also have a warm smile made all the difference during challenging times. From the laughs to all the times I cried in your office no judgement at all. You made me feel comfortable no matter what. You haven't just treated my conditions; you've supported my overall well-being, and I'm so incredibly lucky to have had you as my doctor/nurse practitioner. Your professionalism combined with your heartfelt approach has made a significant, positive difference in my life, and I am eternally grateful for the health and hope you've given me. Thank you for being so much more than a doctor/nurse practitioner thank you for being a true partner in my health journey.

Description: Evansville Pain Center offers a compassionate and comprehensive approach to pain management. Our dedicated team of specialists utilizes advanced, evidence-based treatments designed to address a wide range of conditions, including chronic pain, back and joint pain, neuropathy, and headaches. We provide personalized care, from ultrasound-guided injections to physical therapy, all aimed at helping you regain comfort, improve mobility, and enhance your overall quality of life. Experience comprehensive care tailored to your specific needs.

Categories: ["Pain management physician","Alternative medicine practitioner","Doctor","Endocrinologist","Medical clinic","Men's health physician","Women's health clinic","Pain control clinic","Weight loss service"]
Description: Ernesto Padron MD: Interventional Pain Management Specialists is an interventional pain management practice devoted to the treatment of painful conditions, whether acute and/or chronic, to improve pain, function, and enhance the quality of life. We are located in Omaha, NE. Our goal is to provide the best care and treatments for our patients. We expedite a treatment plan for our patients, and through education, we make sure you feel at ease and comfortable with your care plan. Our staff is fluent in English and Spanish.

Description: Matthew Harvey, AGNP-C, is a nurse practitioner who joins the Logan clinic of Southwest Spine and Pain Center as of July 25th. Matthew enjoys being a nurse practitioner because he likes making a positive impact in a patient's life. He believes that, as a nurse, he has a special privilege to be entrusted with the most intimate details of a person's life. Moreover, he enjoys being equipped with the education, knowledge, and ability to help improve a patient's circumstances. He studied at North Idaho College and Boise State University, receiving his associate's, bachelor's, and master's degrees in nursing.

Clinic Hours: Monday: 9 a.m.-5 p.m.|Tuesday: 9 a.m.-5 p.m.|Wednesday: 9 a.m.-5 p.m.|Thursday: 9 a.m.-5 p.m.|Friday: 9 a.m.-5 p.m.|Saturday: Closed|Sunday: Closed
Featured Reviews:
[{"review_id":"Ci9DQUlRQUNvZENodHljRjlvT2kxRmFHOHpNbWRJVWpCbVJWUTVjMUIwY0VsRlZtYxAB","review_link":"https://www.google.com/maps/reviews/data=!4m8!14m7!1m6!2m5!1sCi9DQUlRQUNvZENodHljRjlvT2kxRmFHOHpNbWRJVWpCbVJWUTVjMUIwY0VsRlZtYxAB!2m1!1s0x0:0xbe0b1f2b49a42098!3m1!1s2@1:CAIQACodChtycF9oOi1FaG8zMmdIUjBmRVQ5c1B0cElFVmc%7C0dAlWFp7Nwc%7C?hl=en-US","name":"Chrissy S","reviewer_id":"104231702212793910558","reviewer_profile":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104231702212793910558?hl=en-US","rating":1,"review_text":"UPDATE: It's a few months down the road now and no pain relief for my daughter. I would think being in the pain management business that one could expect at least a bit of pain relief to occur but unfortunately that did not happen. An interlaminar epidural spinal injection was performed and when my daughter had side effects from the procedure she called Dr. G's office and was told that those side effects were perfectly normal however when my daughter went back for her F/U appt the Dr told her that he would not attempt any other spine injections due to the fact that she experienced abnormal side effects from the procedure. So which is it, were the side effects normal or did the procedure cause problems that deemed my daughter as an unfit candidate for any future pain relief i.e, cervical injection etc? I'm also assuming that therapeutic nerve blocks do not exist in this office because we were told he does not do that. Also, when a prescription needed to be refilled that Dr had ordered initially and was set to run out, (a specific compound) she called that into Dr. G's office and was told he/someone would call that script into the compound pharmacy but that never took place so the script was never renewed.
I had such high hopes for Dr. Gutierrez, I was certainly drawn to him because of his credentials but unfortunately my daughter is still in as much pain as before.
**************
I accompanied my daughter this week to her appointment with Dr. Gutierrez and everything went smoothly thanks to the Dr. and his staff. The Medical Assistant is super kind, thorough, and caring and Dr. Gutierrez impressed me a lot. I feel very comfortable with his expertise, you can just tell this guy knows his stuff and that he truly cares. I trust him and more importantly my daughter does too, he's open to discussion and really takes the time to listen. We've never had to wait too long while in his office which is saying a lot given the fact the waiting room is always pretty full, it's kinda striking the number of people that desperately need pain relief. Description:
Under the clinical leadership of H. Keith Robinson, M.D. - Past-Vice President of The Georgia Society of Interventional Pain Physicians - the practice serves patients with a wide variety of chronic pain conditions and spinal-related disorders.

With 4 locations, in Braselton, Buford, and Gainesville, Georgia, Specialty Spine and Pain has provided comprehensive pain management services to the North Georgia and Greater-Atlanta markets for more than 20 years.

The staff there is awesome and are willing to try as best they can to give you a quick and thorough treatment that's best for you. Dr Rodolfo Herrera is nothing short of amazing.  I have never had a pain management doctor that actually listens to me as a person, not just another patient.  He actua cares about me and my issues with pain.  His bedside  manner is fabulous.
I have had several caudal  injections for my chronic back pain.  Each time I have it done, the pain lessens a little longer each time. If you have a fear of doing this, he is so gentle and you don't feel the needle at all. He numbs you up very good.  Absolutely no discomfort.

So I have fibromyalgia as well and we all know that nothing can be done about that but he makes you as comfortable as he possibly can.

Dr Herrera's PA, Kim, is amazing as well.  She listens to your concerns and genuinely cares for you. I love her so much. She also has a huge heart.

Description: Parkview Pain & Spine Institute is a different type of pain clinic. Our double board certified physician provides a concierge level of expertise and compassion to treat pain and improved quality of life. Our focus is advanced, cutting edge, minimally invasive pain treatments for spine, nerve and joint pain. Parkview accepts insurance and also provides transparent cash pay options. Locations in Park City and Salt Lake City. Call to schedule an appointment today.

I have seen three other pain control doctors in Omaha and they neither have the bedside demeanor nor skill of Dr Stottle.  Now he won't let you get away with BSing him or his staff and certainly won't let you violate your pain / prescription agreement!  However, if you are in pain, he will do everything in his power to see you and get you out of pain.  Yes, sometimes he is tied to insurance and pre-approvals, but when I have been at a level 10 pain, he has seen me in the same day and though perhaps I have had to agree to pay his cash price, knowing I can spread the cost of the treatment out over a few months.  At least he saw me the same day and treated me!  Other pain control docs in Omaha won't even see you until the insurance company agrees to pay for the treatment period!  Doctor Stottle's Staff are all extremely caring: from the front desk girls, to the intake nurses, to the injection assistants to the PAs.  I have never encountered a staff member who was not compassionate and willing to bend over backwards to assist a patient!

The other phenomenal thing about Doctor Stottle is he doesn't overschedule patients!  Even when the waiting room is full, I have only waited more than 15 minutes ONCE!  And then I was given a Starbucks gift card to compensate me for my inconvenience!

Absolutely the best Pain Control Doctor in Omaha and possibly in the Midwest!","original_language":"en","review_translated_text":null,"translated_language":null,"published_at":"4 years ago","published_at_date":"2021-07-21T00:45:04","response_from_owner_text":null,"response_from_owner_ago":null,"response_from_owner_date":null,"response_from_owner_translated_text":null,"avatar_link":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-QEBjXGADgfjvW_51C3nGqpmhNm4rAs82fcT3UugJ5lQ_bxrz=s1920","total_number_of_reviews_by_reviewer":47,"total_number_of_photos_by_reviewer":23,"is_local_guide":true,"experience_details":[],"review_photos":[],"review_origin":"google"}]

It's true what people say they don't give you medication on your first visit. I think they would be crazy if they did. They followed the laws of the state of North Carolina regarding pain medicine period if all you're seeking is pills you went to the wrong guy.

Dr Carter didn't just medicate me and send me away he actually took the time over the last 5 years to make my life more bearable. My spine is falling apart due to a birth defect and he is actually taking care of me. Yes some of the procedures that he does are painful but if you have chronic pain you understand that anybody touching that area is going to cause you some pain in order to heal you.

I'd recommend Dr Carter and his staff to anyone. They are one or two people in the office that kind of rub me the wrong way but with a staff that large that's bound to happen. This was extremely disheartening as I have been in pain constantly for years, some days worse than others.

I am now on a journey to find a Dr who is compassionate and has the capacity to understand me and my needs.

I have multiple bulging discs in my back that are pressing on nerves along with Stenosis and issues with my sciatic nerve.

I also recently over the last 2 years have found through MRI that I have some significant issues in my neck as well including congenitally fused vertebrae and numerous other issues which has significantly reduced mobility and increased pain.

I have had injections and while they work the pain is greatly reduced, I bought a Harley 6 years ago and have only put a couple thousand miles on it as a result of severely increased pain after riding for over 30 minutes.

I have done many things including physical therapy losing weight exercising more chiropractic work and more. I can't take road trips in fear of a major flare up.

I work a physical job that I have to be extremely careful with Otherwise I'm laid up in bed for days not my idea of living life, this has caused
Depression because I am limited to what I can and can't do.

I Am Still fairly young at 45 and I want to be comfortable again, as I am looking for the right Dr I read many reviews and these have all be wonderful.

I am wondering if you have an opening and could possibly see me and figure out if I would be a good fit I left the other clinic several months ago because of simply not being able to afford the rates that kept Going up.

I have insurance so I would like to use it anyhow to whoever reads this thank you for your time and I look forward to hearing back, thank you

Description: Parkview Pain & Spine Institute is a different type of pain clinic. Our double board certified physician provides a concierge level of expertise and compassion to treat pain and improved quality of life. Our focus is advanced, cutting edge, minimally invasive pain treatments for spine, nerve and joint pain. Parkview accepts insurance and also provides transparent cash pay options. Locations in Park City and Salt Lake City. Call to schedule an appointment today.

And no mention of patient agreement to be signed.   There was some confusion about his urine test so he left clinic without taking it.  She called and told him to come back in, with no further explanation about importance of test.  As a result, because he didn't return to clinic immediately for urine test, he was \"disqualified from the pain program\" (which he didn't even know he was in and obviously hadn't signed any agreement about it) because of a \"failed\" urine test. When he indicated he's not getting alcohol treatment at this time and also wasn't interested in behavioral therapy, her responses were demeaning, she twisted his words and became combative.  Her professional behavior is reckless, irresponsible and she's a poor communicator. Unfortunately he was not able to help my pain whatsoever.
I came to him roughly 6 months after I fractured my back and tore my glute muscle.
I found the office staff really nice and extremely helpful.
I liked Dr. Patel but I don't feel like he truly listened. I get it, he's the doctor and the one with the medical degree. However, this is my body.
I was told about an App and a book.
This was literally the worst thing you could have given someone in the state I was in.
My body is not hyper aware, I do not have fibromyalgia, this is not in my head, it's not a mystery illness that no one can see, the pain was caused by an accident.
Finally I found a doctor who confirmed the pain is coming from the torn muscle. Not anything else.

Had the doctor listened to his patient my life would have drastically improved.
Not every patient is a text book case. Being open minded and listening is the key to medicine.","original_language":"en","review_translated_text":null,"translated_language":null,"published_at":"2 years ago","published_at_date":"2023-04-07T14:48:10","response_from_owner_text":"Hi Christin. Description:
Clinic appointments in our Edgerton Clinic - attached to Edgerton Hospital

The Edgerton Hospital Pain & Spine Center provides a balanced approach to pain treatment that focuses on restoring patients' function for their daily activities.

Arpan J. Patel, MD and Carmen Walton, APNP offers a range of pain management services, including treatment of the following pain conditions:
Back and neck pain, including sciatica and work-related injuries
Complex Regional Pain Syndrome (CRPS)
Nerve damage and muscle spasm pain
Shingles pain
Arthritis pain
Headache pain

Our balanced treatment plans include minimally invasive procedures, medication management, physical therapy and other services, as needed.

I was in limbo between both places for my acute pain and my surgeon did end up sending a few different things at which were not helping and then again wanted me to talk to my pain specialist. So I do, again and tell them what's going on. But while waiting on a response my surgeon ended up sending me a new pain med,  all very small prescriptions btw. Still waiting on a response from Dr Ahmed's  clinic and when they do answer I tell them a script was sent 2 nights prior. My surgeon even called to speak to the manager to explain that they were wanting me to contact my pain management for pain and that I was simply in the middle of it all. But she stated she felt bad but is following office policy. What a shame. Because every case and every person's situation is not the same! Yet they treat us all like we have a problem. No, people like them are the problem. I will be fine. I will find a new specialist to help me. It's just the fact that I have been treated this way.

Description: Integrated Pain Care is a unique medical alliance bringing together a team of health professionals to help individuals cope with and alleviate physical and emotional pain. By integrating the use of various proven therapies, we fully maximize the pain-reduction capabilities of each and every therapy, while also synergistically combining treatments for an even higher result.

Description:
#ChoosePT
If you've never considered physical therapy as a SOLUTION, it's time to discover just how good you can feel. Have a sprain, strain or nagging pain? Let us take the first look. Choosing physical therapy first over other healthcare options is the right path to recovery.

Title: Cone Health Interventional Pain Management Specialists at Alamance Regional
Detailed Address: 1236 Huffman Mill Rd # 2000, Burlington, NC 27215, United States

Tissue Fragility:
EDS is characterized by connective tissue abnormalities, leading to increased tissue fragility and potential for complications with wound healing and lead migration.
Bleeding Disorders:
Some EDS types are associated with bleeding or clotting issues. This can increase the risk of hematoma formation during or after implantation.
Lead Migration:
The leads of a spinal cord stimulator can potentially move out of place due to joint instability common in EDS, leading to loss of stimulation or the need for revision surgeries.
General Anesthesia:
If general anesthesia is required for the implantation, EDS patients may have increased risks associated with anesthesia, such as airway management issues or adverse reactions.
Individualized Assessment:
A thorough evaluation by a pain specialist and potentially a geneticist experienced with EDS is crucial to assess the potential benefits and risks for each individual patient.","original_language":"en","review_translated_text":null,"translated_language":null,"published_at":"4 months ago","published_at_date":"2025-08-14T16:29:14","response_from_owner_text":"Sarah, thank you for reaching out to us. From the the time you walk in the door until you leave, your made to feel like you are the only patient in the building. They treat you with such care and respect. I walk in and I am usually very nervous and the staff is amazing at keeping you calm. Everyone greets you by name and the environment is so clean and peaceful. Well now where to begin yes the surgical staff is awesome, but Dr.H .Keith Robinson is absolutely amazing.Not only as a doctor but as a human. His compassion and bedside manor are impeccable. I have been a patient of his for over 19 years and I followed him from Northside hospital all the way to Gainsville and will continue to follow him. I drive over an hour one way just to see him . So basically that tells you what kind of doctor and person that man truly is. I am writing this review not because I have to but because I want to. Description: Specialty Spine & Pain specializes in treating a variety of chronic pain conditions, specifically, spinal-based pain disorders. Our physicians are dedicated to offering the most advanced interventional treatments available, and strive to provide expert, personalized care. Our goal is to help patients regain and improve their quality of life. We have four convenient North Georgia locations in Gainesville, Braselton, and Buford. Tackle the pain head on and get the relief you deserve.

Description: The team at Saratoga Hospital Medical Group - Pain Management treats a broad range of conditions, including arthritis pain, back and neck pain, cancer-related pain, diabetic neuropathy, fibromyalgia, and sciatica. They work closely with patients to pinpoint the sources and triggers and develop a personalized plan to improve each patient's quality of life.

Title: Boulder Pain Institute
Detailed Address: 3445 Penrose Pl, Boulder, CO 80301, United States

Description: At Mountain View Pain Center we are dedicated to finding the root cause of your pain. Whether you are dealing with pain from an injury or a condition, we are here to help. While at MVPC, you will receive a custom treatment plan to ensure you get the best care to manage your pain. As an effective alternative to surgery and traditional pain management, we have convenient treatment options available. Start your journey towards a pain-free life by making an appointment with us today!

Description: Dr Gabriel Radu earned his medical degree from the New York College of Osteopathic Medicine. He completed his internship and residency at Albany Medical Center Hospital. Dr Radu is board certified by the American Board of Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation, and sees patients at Saratoga Hospital Medical Group - Pain Management.

Description:
We take a comprehensive, patient-centered approach to helping you manage pain. We provide you with the utmost support to help you regain your highest level of functioning and improve the quality of your life. Because your pain doesn't define you.

Our proudest accomplishments are our patients' success stories where we have successfully treated patients with difficult cases such as failed back surgery syndrome, peripheral neuropathies, and complex regional pain syndrome.
